words.def: a person or animal that is markedly unusual or deformed
a person who makes deceitful pretenses
The groove or slit created by cutting a workpiece; an incision.
something that is a counterfeit
a dissolute man in fashionable society
an emotion experienced in anticipation of some specific pain or danger (usually accompanied by a desire to flee or fight)
an agenda of things to do
Alternative spelling of kif.
The twenty-second letter of the Arabic alphabet.
(Judaism) sacred chest where the ancient Hebrews kept the two tablets containing the Ten Commandments
large brownish-green New Zealand parrot
(sports) the chief official (as in boxing or American football) who is expected to ensure fair play
a terrorist organization that seeks to overthrow the government dominated by Tutsi and to institute Hutu control again
a period marked by distinctive character or reckoned from a fixed point or event
the sense organ for hearing and equilibrium
a unit of surface area equal to 100 square meters
unknown god
Library American Library Association  abbreviation for forty-eighth, a book size 7. 5-10 cm in height; a book of that height.
the syllable naming the fourth (subdominant) note of the diatonic scale in solmization
a colorless and odorless inert gas
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
one.
